mapper.insert: insert into member(member_idx, member_name, member_email, member_password, member_role, member_address, member_address2, member_create_date, member_mileage, member_point, member_id, member_phone, member_sessionId, member_limitTime) values(#{memberIdx}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberRole}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberAddress2},#{memberCreateDate}, 0, 0, #{memberId}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberSessionId}, #{memberLimitTime})
mapper.update: update member set member_sessionId=#{memberSessionId}, member_limitTime=#{memberLimitTime} where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_id = #{memberId}
select member_id from member where member_email=#{memberEmail}
